info.name: GaiaOnline) Fix Unequip All
info.description:
Replaces the "Get Nekkid" button with a graphic reading "Unequip All." Functions normally, looks great.

Want it to say something else? Here's a template: http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v259/kougyoku/lolno/unequiptemplate.png

UPDATE: 7/4 Edited to conform to Firefox 3.5
